title: HONOR LEVEL 0 IS HELL
body:
BEEN COMPLAINING ABOUT IT TAKING TOO LONG TO REACH LEVEL 3 HONOR? HAHAHA, HERE'S MY LITTLE STORY!

Alright so it's been exactly 26 days since I got unbanned, been playing both blind pick and soloQ actively almost everyday since then, made it from silver 4 to gold 2 and hoping to hit plat as soon as I practice a consistent secondary role, been trying my best to be tilt proof and haven't received any further infractions yet, been getting an average of 1 or 2 teammates honors every single game; 4 honors in some rare occasions, still honor level 0. Still not even sure if I'll access the end-of-season rewards and whether it's even related to the new honor system; which is important as this can render my journey to plat obsolete.

Note 1: it's noteworthy with the old honor system I'm fairly certain I would've unlocked the honor rewards within 5 days max playing actively, perhaps even less.

Note 2: Within few days of getting unbanned (and supposedly reforming) I received an in-game message of unlocking honor rewards (which I thought was advancing to honor level 1) that applied only to chests, still got 0 fragments and my status is still "Dishonorable" sitting at level 0.

Note 3: I'm not complaining but just sharing my exotic experience through the new and improved honor system.

replies.body:
Funny thing i got 14 days ban too and I've been positive from there on still level 0 after a month.
I played on a ranked account and found a Renekton that was honor 5 and went 0-5 and went afk and hard flamed me(the jungler) checked him out still not banned
cool system

New Honor System is just Cancer imo. Friend of mine played 1 Game a day 7days got Honor lvl 3 after 1 Week 7fkn Games. This Honor System seems like totally random. I did play like 3Games avg for 2months sitting at Honor Level 2 i didnt flamed or anything. For that i have other acc that one got 14day suspension and reading all this makes me think Why teh hell if u are Level 0 u shud stop flaming and trying to reform when u dont get a single reward for it. Getting lvl 3 just is fkn impossible and u cant drop under 0 so i dont realy want to but i feel like its my Job to flame now cuz the acc is Level 0 without any hope of ever getting to Lvl 3 I mean its maybe 3 months til season end and if 2months of consistent play without any Flame/feed or smth dont make u lvl 3 from lvl 2 then how teh fk u are supposed to ever get from 0 to 3 in a Season ?

If the Idea behind the system is to make people more friendly then let them raise faster and loose Honor levels faster this way u shud have ard 90% friendly games. But this shi t just tilts even more. Its even tiliting if u are winning and getting 3 honors per game and absolutely nth happens with ur Honor Level.

So if u drop to Level 0 just flame the shit out of all the kids that deserve it !

It's been 1 month and a half now, already hit platinum, still playing actively and yet honor level 0.

The struggle is real my man.
2 months. 2 MONTHS of trying to get away from honor level 0 like seriously i got the lock thing away in the first day but i absolutely need like 200 honors to get out of this crap.
one year with level 0 honor

I got a 14 day ban with and had no previous chat restrictions. Thing is that I was an idiot and "counter flamed" a guy that flamed my whole team. I still deserved it and I feel like I've become what I hate the most in League of Legends. I did learn from it though and I will stay cool in the future. Remember to mute anyone being toxic or flaming and then report them after the game. Flaming them back is not worth it...  I learned the hard way.

I agree but I rarely flame myself. If a TF goes 0-3 against AP grages in lane and goes "report yi for inting" when I die once to him I tell myself "let me show you real inting" - which is what got me banned in the first place, but don't do that anymore.

Still level 0 though :/
“It’s been exactly 26 days since I’ve been unbanned” ohh this’ll be hilarious
Honor level 1 by 2020, hopefully.

My friend msg me "kys" so I wrote back "Kys kys kys" and I got banned for flaming him as a joke. It was a debatable ban since we were duo'd and still got banned after a stomping win. Thats w.e, I actually even called it too after that game, but what I don't understand was why the support was so rude, and that I've been sitting at level 0 for months and months without progress, (not the locked mode, but level 0) and I'm constantly getting 3+ honors. Riot needs to fix this honestly. My gf, plays 10  times less than me, is new and feeds a lot of her games, gets 1 or 2 honors at most never 3, and still hit lvl 5 honor before I even hit level 3.{{sticker:sg-shisa}}
hmmmmm idk dude I got honor level 1 after my first game. Maybe it could be because you're not being honorable? Or a cool dude? YOu seem high strung.

> [{quoted}](name=JaaamesBaaaxter,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=TQAhq6QI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-08T21:47:27.640+0000)

ALso it does take into account that you've been banned before, which I can assume was for behavior?

The problem I see with all this. Is that AFK'S and Trolls are probably laughing right now. Those are the ones who should really be punished, Afking and trolling should the number one priority for Riot, not fucking people who said a bad word, in which a lot of the times its because they encountered some type of troll. I«m with the OP, lvl 0 honor for like more than 3 months now!

> [{quoted}](name=Shroom Powder,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=TQAhq6QI,comment-id=000000000002,timestamp=2017-10-11T20:53:01.398+0000)

I«m with the OP, lvl 0 honor for like more than 3 months now!

Fun fact the term Troll is not a noun but a verb, the term "trolling" is a verb meaning to search or scour, meaning theyre trolling FOR something, and that something is the bad words you say. They want you to be mad. Have you never heard the term "Don't feed the troll?" 

We refer and think of them as the little under the bridge people sure but the source comes from the verb. Don't give them what they want. Ignore them, report them, move on. its 45 minutes out of your (on average) 70 year life.

Grow up
i doubt anyone here flames first untill they are provoked or someone throws the game on purpose first

Did you even read the OP? Well yes, I been for 14-days due to intentional feeding; hence the demotion to honor level 0. If it's a chat restriction I assume you get demoted to level 1. You can't convince me one can reach level 1 off 1 game after a 14-days ban just by being honorable, else I would be level 5 already ;)

I didnt say I had a 14 day ban.

I have been stuck for ages on honor 0 after beeing chat banned.
And its really hard to reform when they seem to cut off any form of reward for you to do so. :( 

bad system
It´s been 3 Months now, already got ranked in, invested 40€ and reached most honored realy often. But im still not Honor level 1? Somethings wrong i think. {{sticker:cass-cry}}

{{champion:38}} i got a 14 day suspension and have been honor level 0 for almost 4 months now, playing actively and getting atleast 1 honor whether that be from a friend or some random dude that idk
I'm in a similar situation, I've been unbanned for 3 and a half months, I've been playing very actively, I get at least 1 honor almost every game, still nothing.

That is actually disturbing. I hope they at least reset honor levels to 1 or 2 by next season. I couldn't care less about end-of-season honor rewards (though I do care about ranked ones) but it'd be cool to be able to acquire key fragments again.

I don't hate being honor level 0 because I don't get rewards, but because I feel "dishonored" which I guess is the point. I never thought a positive person like me would get a ban, but it was late and I had enough from that guy. Being honor level 0 just feels wrong... I was honor 5 before and never flamed. This is my first time flaming and I got a ban for it. But as I said... I deserved it.
You didn´t. How is it fair to drop from 5 to 0 for one bad game ? You should drop to 4 or smthing like that. This is just dumb
Got banned for 14 days about 3 months ago, getting honors pretty much every game but still honor level 0 with "0 out of 3 checkpoints". Nice.

I got a 10 Game Chat Restriction at the start of the Honor System. Since I have been stuck in Honor Level 1 for 8 months. I have been playing daily and have been getting constant Honors every game, atleast 1 or 2 honors each game. Nevertheless I have not ranked up. Until a week back. I got another 10 Game Chat Restriction. Now I am Honor Level 0. Good to know that for the next 3 Seasons I will be Honor Level 0. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

(B)een trying to get some honour up myself  best bet would be just to all party up play with eachother and honour ourselves in pvp match-made games. As they seem to just like lock us all out i cant even forge things in loot let alone get keys or anything fun while playing anymore, cause they dont care. I play every round as support buying redemption for the lol's as there no way to redeem anywhere else but on the rift.

      (A)lso before i say more the worst is when the riot employee search for people who post this "riot never reads" then they comment on those specific posts like hah i had some w**d and am here.

      (M)any people have posted about the riot community being a bunch of platinum's who don't even want new players to join there ranks the designers of the game would rather ban out anyone badmouthing them than tell someone its rigged. anyone whose even made it to platinum knows that character pros start to struggle vs get debuffed and ones that are pros new favorites get buffed and its all like a premade decision on whose gunna be best champ. ahem POPPY. then taric then cho then galeo all buffed cause a pro team wanted the composition.


BAM...

I was honor lvl 5, played my usual ekko mid because my opponent blind picked ori. I proceed to get first blood and absolutely shit on her in lane. I got 2 more solo kills and was ahead 50 ish cs. My botlane was kalista+thresh vs ziggs adc and morgana. Kalista and thresh some fucking how proceeds to feed ziggs 7 kills between the 2 of them, and he gets first blood turret before 15 mins then he does what hes supposed to do snowball his lead. Ziggs came mid with morg im 3v1 mid while my botlane is just afk farming  with me spam pinging for help, the ziggs one shot my turret from 70% health, i fucked up and got hit by a morgana Q then get killed. THEN MY BOTLANE PROCEEDS TO TELL ME "HEY EKKO YOURE SHIT BRO WHY FIGHT 3v1". Needless to say i gave them a decent flame back. So why after the game i get a 25 fucking game chat restriction while they got nothing. RIOT FIX YOUR FUCKING PUNISHMENT SYSTEM PLEASE. LISTEN TO OUR CRIES. MAJORITY OF THE PEOPLE THAT REPORT ARE JUST TROLLERS WHO GOT SOMEONE TO FLAME THEM ON PURPOSE JUST TO GET THEM BANNED.

Why did you get punished? It's like you said you flamed them and because you have a history of poor behavior as evidenced by you receiving a 25-game chat restriction instead of a 10-game one. Other people behaving poorly doesn't excuse your own poor behavior. Also, how do you know they didn't receive a punishment? For all you know they did receive a punishment (such as a chat restriction). Next time if someone is trying to get a rise out of you don't fall for it: just mute, report and move on.

the problem is they only show you your chat log so you don't even have context for the chat to try and contest it.

like okay, maybe somebody raged, but was somebody raging at them 10 x harder? Does not make it okay, does not make the behavior acceptable, but I do think they should be punished less severely if somebody is actively threatening to murder their family or rape them.

> [{quoted}](name=Fake Gamer Girl,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=TQAhq6QI,comment-id=001300000000,timestamp=2017-10-05T11:59:44.890+0000)
>
> the problem is they only show you your chat log so you don't even have context for the chat to try and contest it.

The thing is though, most of the time even with context the outcome of the case wouldn't change at all.
 
> like okay, maybe somebody raged, but was somebody raging at them 10 x harder? Does not make it okay, does not make the behavior acceptable, but I do think they should be punished less severely if somebody is actively threatening to murder their family or rape them.

Punishments are based on consistency X severity, meaning that people who show consistent negative behavior (typical rage and flame) receive standard punishments (i.e. they'll follow the standard IFS punishment route) as well as those who show severely negative behavior (hate speech, death threats, racist comments, gameplay trolling, etc.) receive a more harsher and escalated punishment than they normally would (i.e. instead of a chat restriction they'd receive a 2-week or permanent ban).

What does this all mean for your example? It means that that the person threatening murder or rape would receive a much harsher punishment than the person who raged and flamed them without resorting to threats of harm, though that flamer would still receive an appropriate punishment based on their punishment history (assuming that both were reported and punished of course).

> [{quoted}](name=Prandine,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=TQAhq6QI,comment-id=0013000000000000,timestamp=2017-10-05T14:22:00.513+0000)
>
>Punishments are based on consistency X severity, meaning that people who show consistent negative behavior (typical rage and flame) receive >standard punishments (i.e. they'll follow the standard IFS punishment route) as well as those who show severely negative behavior (hate speech, >death threats, racist comments, gameplay trolling, etc.) receive a more harsher and escalated punishment than they normally would (i.e. instead of >a chat restriction they'd receive a 2-week or permanent ban).

lol if only. I had 1 game 1 night where i came home drunk and flamed/fed like crazy. That 1 game sent my account from never had a warning before to 14 day ban and lvl 0 honor. Months later and still honor 0. This system is stupid.

absolutely same here man. i think they wont let us proceed to honor 1 this season
my story is a little tilting tbh. i was cas mid vs an akali (blind pick) and i proceed to get shit on by akali spamming mastery 7 and lol ez every time she kills me. i try to stun her with r but my ping was kinda shitt at the time and by the time my r is registered she has dashed on my ass and is behind me resulting in a wasted r and a death for me. i got super tilted and after one of the lol ez i just cracked. the flame wasnt even that much nor have i done so any other time. this was seriously the first game ever (and ive been playing since season 2) that i have flamed someone. one game later BAM 14 day ban. turns out the akali was premade with the other 4 people from their team and they all reported me so the systed just decided i should get 14 day ban and i had just reached honor 3. still grinding to recover and so far im still 0
Is it even possible to move from level 0 to level 1? I'm in the same boat, also getting that "unlocked" message, but I haven't moved to 1 after a month of daily play with honers.

Right after a punishment, you're 'locked' out of gaining honor or receiving key fragments. The message about unlocking honor rewards means that you can now start gaining honor, and as soon as you hit honor level 1, you can start getting key frags again.

yep and then theres those people who act like they know what they are saying and try to prove you wrong even though its pretty clear that rito is just a bad company and doesnt respect the rights of the player/customer. At the start of playing this game, the account isnt even yours, its riots, and they can do whatever the hell they want with it according to their little "agreement" at the end of every patch update. So if you spend 1000 dollars on your account they wont have any sympathy or empathy they will just straight up ban that account and there goes 3 weeks of pay gone in a one click of a button. The honor system is also very inaccurate and not explained correct. I had a cassoipeia that had honor level 5 and when our bot lane started to lose lane she comepletely went flaming calling them useless fucks. After she said that I was like "honor 5 material right here", and then I get chat restricted and my honor turns to honor 1. Hello? Rito are u there? Get your shit straight. The new honor system is just another way of rito fuckin around with you.

I have been at honor level zero for the past 5 months. Heck im level 91 for crying out loud. That mean i have been playing constantly and getting great honor from people. Yet I am still 0 honor. This honor system is bullshit. It punishes people hard for being human and flaming. We all do it once in a while. I should be able to raise my honor back to regular. Heck the New season even came and dropped and my honor Level is still 0. I said it before and I will say it again this system is bullshit. I am getting to the point where there is no point in even playing because i cant receive any rewards even after months of being cool in game. Bullshit rito this is bullshit!!!!!!

I got banned a few months ago, after that I figured it was time to stop joking around since riot actually takes stuff seriously. Been getting at least one honor ever game, still at 0 honor. Didn't even realize you could level up until I searched up what was going on, thought it was a glitch or a feature that was being added later in the year. I'm having the same issues as everyone on this forum, this is ridiculous.
Same dude, lvl 0 honor is so much bs, i went from lvl 2 honor to lvl 4 in only one and a half weeks, but the same amount of time as passed and im still lvl 0.
Honor level 0 is meant to be hell.
would be nice if RIOT actually replied to these types of questions lmfao
the only thing i sad in game was kys and i imediatly got banned, and i sad that to a guy who was flaming the whole game
As well for me. 2 months after 14 days ban. Behaving myself. Still Honor LvL 0.. Something is wrong.

Riot posted a image on instagram wich says that people who are banned for seven days of more after 22 august are not eligible for free rewards. 
This also contains end of the season rewards.

They will probably reset your honor level as soon as the season ends.

> A banned guy

the exact same scenario over here got banned at the end of urf that was back in late august for 14 days got unbanned and have been playing consistently I didn't flame once got no other bans or restrictions but it all seems to be in vain I'm tired of trying honestly this horrible honor system is broken
huh, you just made me realize its been that long since i was banned as well. Wow.{{sticker:sg-janna}}
Same here dude. It's goddamn impossible.

I was muted for 24 games and given dishonorable and then after the penalty I was told I could receive honor again.
It's been 2-3 months. I get honored regularly as well. Submitted two tickets to Riot, both times was told it's completely normal.. but why was I given a message saying I could receive honor again, if I actually can't? If I screenshot every single honor I would have received at least 500 honors by now from non-premade teammates.. Maybe more.
